results.name: Largest of smallest parts in partitions of n into exactly three primes.
comment: a(n)<=n/3; equality occurs at n= 3*prime, and then a(n) are new records 2,3,5,7,11,.. - _Zak Seidov_, Aug 09 2009
link: Index entries for sequences related to Goldbach conjecture
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 08 2009
